Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

NameDescription
BRAP CommonLibrary and tools used for BRAP client and server.
BRAP ClientClient Library for connecting to a BRAP-exposed remoting service.
BRAP ServerServer Library for exposing remoting services with BRAP.
BRAP ModificationServer addon that emulates "pass-by-reference" for method arguments, so that changes applied on the server is visible on the client after the method invocation returns.
BRAP SpringSpring Support Library for BRAP-Server. Expose Spring Beans with BRAP.
BRAP ExamplesExamples for BRAP client and server usage, including BRAP-Spring.
BRAP System testAutomatic system test for brap
